title: Honor System
body:
I just don't like how all my years and everyones years of playing League of legends is that you guys removed everyones honors they had from all those previous years just to update it to change it completely and how we can only honor one person. I had like 400+ honorable opponents and teamwork. And newcomers can just get it like nothing. I've spent countless of years trying to get an Honor emblem but noooo you guys updated it and just took it away from me. Why not just give us the things we deserve for the honors, and leave how many times we got honored alone. I'd like to show people who look at my profile to see how much honors I had . now its ZERO JUST LIKE HOW Y'ALL ALSO TOOK AWAY HOW MANY NORMALS YOU WON LIKE I HAD 1400 GAMES IN NORMALS WON YOU KNOW HOW MUCH I LOVED TO SHOW THAT? I FELT LIKE A VETERAN BUT NOOO YOU ALSO UPDATED THAT TOO AND CHANGED IT. THIS ISNT FUN ANYMORE I LIKE TO KEEP MY MEMORIES ON MY MATCHES AND HONORS.

replies.body: You can still get most of that info, like total games played or won, on the [**privacy website**](http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/). We've still got the data from all of your old honors, and I believe the dev team is still currently looking into ways we can reward players who hit certain milestones, but I don't have any more information on that quite yet. Be sure to keep an eye out for updates on that matter though!
Was wondering about the new Honor Profile. Will there be an option in the future to choose what rank we would like to display on our profile? I don't really treat my Flex 3v3 rank as my actual one.
The Honor rank you're currently at is the same Honor rank you will have across the board. It's meant to be an overall measurement of your positive attitude in matches!

So First off, I'd like to say that I am over frustrated of how the new Alpha Client removed everything we actually own.
Let me explain you,

Since the new client looked pretty much based on only ranked stats border (Flex 3s/Flex 5s/Solo Q borders), a lot of players (including me) started playing Flex3s/Flex5s to match their solo q border so then their profile looks good. I was Platinum III in every queue ( Flex 3s, Flex 5s and Solo Q ) since Riot said that these new queues would have an impact at the end of season.

They first removed ARAM/Normal stats ( Wins,Turrets,Cs ) to I guess make the client less packed. ( I was and still actually tilted of them removing this ) They said they would do something about it when they released the Alpha Client wich never happened. 

When I heard about the new Honor system I was pretty excited since I had over 940 teamwork Ribbons, 450 Honorable opponent, 350 Friendly and 90 Helpful. Threw my 3 seasons of League, i've had a lot of honors given by players because I've always kept calm and be nice/professional with everyone I played with ( ofc i had some downs ). Players looking at my ribbons were always surprised on how much I try harded to get these ribbons.  I was wondering if Riot would recognize my hard work with new system...

No

I just logged into my client. So... All my ribbons are gone. My Flex 3s/Flex 5s borders are gone. Now all I see is a Solo Q border and on the left the Honor Badge. Really??!!

So by doing that they just gave to anybody the opportunity of creating a lot of smurfs. Why? Simply because creating a fresh new account right now, can get you to the same kind of profile of someone who played for over 4 years. Basically what I'm trying to say is that all the effort I've put into that game are gone. Nothing left. At the moment, my smurf looks exactly like my main account. I opened it up and it is actually the same kind of profile. I'd like you guys to think on a way of giving the ancient ones the respect they deserve and the hard work they have made to play your game over all those years.

I hope this get's somewhere because this is getting out of Hand.
Jérémi, best regards
Yeah, LostFrost is correct. I was referring to the ranked system. Sorry for any mixups.
Ahhhh my bad! You can still see all of that info by hovering over the rank. It'll show a little popup of all your ranks, even if you're looking at someone elses profile.

Why doesnt it show you highest rank as on your profile first. I really dont like having my flex rank showing first over my solo rank because it is much lower. its frustrating that i have to hover over it to see my solo q rank when it should be the rank that is showcased on my account and not in the background behind my flex q rank. Is there a way to change which rank is shown on the front of your account???

Prokolipsi is most likely asking about the ranked emblems on the profile.
It no longer shows all three queues, just one single rank queue at random.

Give back my Honors >:( fak the new honor system.
